products.title: Sumi Indigo Roman Blind
products.description: Like to stand out from the crowd? Then you'll love this sumi indigo roman blind, with a pattern that's huge in their wallpaper collections. Described as bold and graphic, with an abstract architectural feel, harlequin certainly have a good thing going with this pattern, and in a like to stand out from the crowd? Then you'll love this sumi indigo roman blind, with a pattern that's huge in their wallpaper collections.

products.title: Trellis Steel Roman Blind
products.description: Simple greys and simple whites in a simple trellis pattern - its the perfect way to add pattern to your home in the most elegant way imaginable. We all know how good grey is as a neutral tone, it will sit comfortably everywhere an added bonus if you like to change your decor simple greys and simple whites in a simple trellis pattern - its the perfect way to add pattern to your home in the most elegant way imaginable.

products.title: Leaf Indigo Roman Blind
products.description: Gigantic leaves and deep, luscious colour. Now if thats not a combination of pure sophistication, we don't know what is. This harlequin additions design makes a great roman blind, offering a statement piece to your windows, as well as exquisite shading.

products.title: Amazilia Lime Roman Blind
products.description: When harlequin are at their best, there really is no rival and this amazilia lime roman blind really is up there. Beautiful flowers, gorgeous humming birds, youll feel like youre in a tropical paradise. Whats more, the gorgeous golden lime tone adds zesty colour to your sur when harlequin are at their best, there really is no rival and this amazilia lime roman blind really is up there.

products.title: Flores Damson Roman Blind
products.description: We love the dark romantic nature of the flores damson. The whole design is so elegantly put together, from the subtle colour palette to the watercolour look of the florals. We love just how artistic this blind looks. When its hung, it looks just like something straight out of we love the dark romantic nature of the flores damson.

products.title: Amazilia Jade Roman Blind
products.description: The amazilia jade roman blind is full of colour and energy, the perfect combo for livening up a tired, plain room. And its part of their harlequin additions collection, so you have designer style on your side too. The white florals against such a strong background creates a fre the amazilia jade roman blind is full of colour and energy, the perfect combo for livening up a tired, plain room.

products.title: Amazilia Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Wow, what an absolute beauty we have here. The amazilia linen roman blind is just another example of what makes the designers at harlequin so great. Here we have gorgeous hummingbirds fluttering around blooming stems, with the soft neutral background allowing their breasts to wow, what an absolute beauty we have here.

products.title: Gardenia Byzantium Roman Blind
products.description: Softly sweet and ever so sophisticated, this gardenia byzantium roman blind dresses your home with delicacy. Plus, its from their harlequin additions range, so you get the designer touch too. There are pastel tones of lilac and pistachio against a pale cream, with a simple rep softly sweet and ever so sophisticated, this gardenia byzantium roman blind dresses your home with delicacy.

products.title: Babushka Cadet Roman Blind
products.description: If youre looking for something light and delicate to add a gentle touch to your home then this babushka cadet roman blind from the harlequin additions collection is a wonderful choice. Simple stripes will never go out of style and in these soft, scandi tones they bring sophis if youre looking for something light and delicate to add a gentle touch to your home then this babushka cadet roman blind from the harlequin additions collection is a wonderful choice.

products.title: Silhouette Cerise Roman Blind
products.description: Harlequin loves to take unexpected colour combinations with their silhouette design so weve taken this great legacy on board with their silhouette cerise roman blind. Granted pinks and purples is no extraordinary combination, but throw in a mustard gold, and youve got a comple harlequin loves to take unexpected colour combinations with their silhouette design so weve taken this great legacy on board with their silhouette cerise roman blind.

products.title: Floris Mimosa Roman Blind
products.description: Fresh as daisies, the floris mimosa roman blind is a beautiful sight to be awoken by each morning, with its lively yellow colour filling oversized blooms. And its this that we love about their harlequin additions collections the emotion their designs evoke and the beauty th fresh as daisies, the floris mimosa roman blind is a beautiful sight to be awoken by each morning, with its lively yellow colour filling oversized blooms.

products.title: Metamorphic Azurite Roman Blind
products.description: This beautiful and soothing blind from their harlequin additions range features a range of blues that reminds us of the glorious sea on a warm summers day. The metamorphic azurite roman blind offers a calm aesthetic with cool ocean blues in a relaxing stripe pattern.

products.title: Knightsbridge, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The knightbridge in navy offers a rich, sumptuous blue on the finely woven fabric so typical of its range. The cloth is lightweight and nimble, so it drapes neatly into its roman blind folds, and is lined with polycotton sateen fabric to protect it from colour fade. Add a classical touch to a contemporary living or dining room by blending the navy with white walls and lime green accents. This unique colour combination will provide a fantastic vivacity to the room and, accentuated with glossy silver metallics, will combine the modern with the traditional beautifully.

products.title: Knightsbridge, Scarlet - Roman Blind
products.description: In a bright red tone, the scarlet adds life and vivacity to the smooth suppleness of the knightsbridge fabric. Finely woven, and backed with polycotton sateen lining, the cloth folds beautifully into the classic roman style. Add a wild burst of colour to a monochromatic room, whether it be a kitchen, living room, or bedroom. You could even go for an untraditional colour scheme in the bathroom - after all, who was it who said it has to be blue and green? Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width.

products.title: Knightsbridge, Ocean - Roman Blind
products.description: In a muted sea tone, the knightsbridge ocean offers a hushed sensibility, versatile in its use and subtle in its colour. This pretty shade of petrol blue can be used as the main feature of a room or as a complementary accent with ease. Group the ocean with pretty sea hues, such as aquas, greens, and cool blues, to form a seaside theme in the bathroom. Stick to a white base but furnish and accessorise heavily with colour to bring this traditional colour scheme to life.

products.title: Knightsbridge, Smoke - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a cool, neutral grey, with hints of beige, the knightsbridge in smoke offers a blank canvas for a number of decor and colour schemes. The linen-like fabric is lightweight, durable, and soft to the touch, making this blind both attractive and functional. Settle the beige mushroom smoke amidst soft, tonal blues to add a gentle neutral to tame the scheme. Together, the colours will form a coastal look, so add bleached woods and shabby chic furniture to complete the style.

products.title: Knightsbridge, Taupe - Roman Blind
products.description: Fresh and linen-like in a neutral country beige, the knightsbridge taupe is a versatile and accommodating blind, well suited to a number of different decor styles and colour schemes. As always, the roman style adds softness and curves that complement the utilitarian shade of this blind perfectly. The taupe will work wonderfully as a tempering neutral tone for a deep hunter's green. Amalgamate greens, beiges, and country checks for a serious and studious feel in a classically styled home office, with a rustic rural twist.

products.title: Knightsbridge, Cream - Roman Blind
products.description: Just like its soft, lightweight, and linen-feel fabric, the light cream shade of the knightsbridge cream is simple and versatile. The finely woven cloth is highly durable, and is made even more so by their polycotton sateen lining, which backs all of their romans. Team the cream with soft aquas and pale taupes for a light and airy atmosphere in your guest bedroom or home study. You'll appreciate the calming influence yet will still be able to add colour with turquoises and golds.

products.title: Allure Faux Silk Mink Roman Blind
products.description: This stylish little roman blind will give your home a real designer look. The sleek faux silk in a glorious pearl shade is complemented by a coordinating minky grey border on three sides. Use this blind to lighten up your space, give you an open and luxurious feeling. Add on a li this stylish little roman blind will give your home a real designer look.

products.title: Accents Pumice Roman Blind
products.description: Our cavendish cream roman blind is incredibly popular so we decided to add a little bit of designer style and include a gorgeous skinny border on three sides to add a real touch of sophistication. The complementary palette of pumice and cream will keep your room feeling light, sp their cavendish cream roman blind is incredibly popular so we decided to add a little bit of designer style and include a gorgeous skinny border on three sides to add a real touch of sophistication.

products.title: Ahisma Luxe Faux Silk Pearl & Stone Trimmed Roman Blind
products.description: Neutral tones with a twist, this ahisma luxe faux silk pearl roman blind with its coordinated pompom trim adds a whole new element to your modern decor. ? The sleek finish of the faux silk fabric brings a luxurious finish to your window while the fun, dangling tassels add person neutral tones with a twist, this ahisma luxe faux silk pearl roman blind with its coordinated pompom trim adds a whole new element to your modern decor.

products.title: Flamingos, Aqua - Roman Blind
products.description: The bright and refreshing light blue of the flamingos in aqua is perfect for brightening up any home. Sweet flamingos, gently drawn in ice whites and candy pinks, skim the water and add colour to this delightful blind. The most obvious place for this water-themed roman blind would be in the bathroom, where it will look stunning against bright white tiles and blue accessories, but a fun alternative might be the guest bedroom, where you can accessorise with varying shades of sky blue and the occasional soft pink too.

products.title: Hedgerow, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: In the hedgerow charcoal, current florals, in taupes, mustards, greys, and blacks, sit on a soft, creamy beige background. The linen-look cloth hangs neatly into the flowing shape of the roman, giving a classical edge to this modern blind. Go for contemporary cosiness in the living room by placing the charcoal amongst similarly coloured accents. Pick just one or two shades from the blind, perhaps mustard yellow and mushroom grey, and scatter them, in the form of lamps, cushions, and oddments, throughout the room.

products.title: Sicily, Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: Silky, royal blue thread, gently speckled with gold, makes a gorgeously regal base for the sicily blue, which is otherwise adorned with its traditional diamond patterning in gold and sweet pops of petrol blue. Design a traditional and moody bathroom look by hanging the blue amongst white victorian tiling, matching blue walls, and a roll-top, claw-foot bath. Opt for classic gold taps and fittings, ensuring that you still have all of your mod-cons, and bedeck the room in luxurious gold frames and oddments.

products.title: Sicily, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: An aqua blue fabric forms the base of the sicily duck egg, and is embossed with shimmering gold diamond shapes and pretty pops of textured oatmeal, altogether forming an opulent yet stylish blind with plenty of charm. Choose traditional luxe as the theme for your master bedroom, settling the duck egg amongst cream walls and matching aqua bedlinen and cushions. Use plenty of gold to complement the blind and further increase the feeling of grandeur and luxury in the room.

products.title: Sicily, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: In subtle mocha and golden taupe, the sicily chocolate is simply delectable. Pretty diamonds emboss the plain fabric, and further adornments come in the form of fluffy tufts of coffee on top, adding texture and depth to this discreetly glamorous blind. Fashion a classic brown, gold, and cream scheme in the spare bedroom so that your guests can relax in comfort and style, making themselves at home.

products.title: Sicily, Wine - Roman Blind
products.description: Gold-speckled claret acts as a glistening base for gold-threaded diamonds and pretty tufts of wine-coloured fabric in the rich and traditional sicily wine. Formed into gently draping roman curves, the cloth becomes even more palatial, resplendent in its glamorous shades. Create a living room of opulence and luxury with the wine as a starting point, choosing cream or oatmeal walls to form a neutral base.

products.title: Sicily, Mocha - Roman Blind
products.description: Pretty mocha and milky cappuccino unite here in this coffee-infused addition to the deluxe sicily range. With the usual, luxurious diamond shapes and shimmering threads, this blind offers nothing but pure elegance and luxury. For a subtle chic in your hallway or landing, where you might not want to overpower the space with strong hues, hang the mocha against cream or magnolia walls, where it will sit beautifully and match a range of neutral tones, such as browns, golds, and taupes.

products.title: Sicily, Terracotta - Roman Blind
products.description: The sicily terracotta has a russet orange base which, covered in shimmering gold diamonds and wine-coloured tufts of fabric, forms a distinct and regal appeal. This trio of colours works wonderfully together, inspiring feelings of splendour and royalty. Give your dining room, living room, or master bedroom a glamorous boost by hanging the traditional terracotta amongst soft oatmeal walls and dark mahogany furniture.

products.title: Sicily, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: The diamond embossed sicily gold features a muted golden cloth interjected with a glossy gold thread and pops of camel chenille-feel fabric. The result is a feeling of pure luxury and grandeur, further enhanced by the resplendent folds of the roman style. The gold would work beautifully in a grand living room or dining room, but why not forget convention and use this lush blind in the bathroom instead? Incorporate it into a traditional victorian look by teaming with deep blue walls, a roll-top, claw-foot bath, and dark wooden floors.

products.title: Sicily, Silk - Roman Blind
products.description: Silky, golden cream threads, in glamorous diamond shapes, adorn the smooth cream fabric of the sicily silk. The blind is further ornamented with smaller diamonds in a pale oatmeal, wool-feel cloth, adding tons of texture and extra character. The silk will add a subtle opulence to a traditional living room, where it will look fine and deluxe amongst shimmering golds, soft creams, and pale taupes. Woods in any colour will work, with darker mahoganies creating a more classical feel.

products.title: Ahisma Luxe Faux Silk Rose Gold Roman Blind
products.description: If youre looking to create a sophisticated living space to entertain and rejuvenate in, then make sure you make the ahisma luxe faux silk rose gold your roman blind of choice. With a neutral colourway that carries soft blush undertones dressing your windows, embellished with if youre looking to create a sophisticated living space to entertain and rejuvenate in, then make sure you make the ahisma luxe faux silk rose gold your roman blind of choice.
